verbs.description: A new revelation in the ongoing Russia interference investigation , special counsel Robert Mueller [V: is] now targetting Donald Trump 's best friend Tom Barrack .

[ARGM-ADV: A new revelation in the ongoing Russia interference investigation] , [ARG0: special counsel Robert Mueller] is [ARGM-TMP: now] [V: targetting] [ARG1: Donald Trump 's best friend Tom Barrack] .
